meanings.sent1: The euthanasic decision was made to end the suffering of the terminally ill patient.
meanings.sent2: The euthanasic procedure was carried out with utmost care and compassion.
meanings.sent3: The euthanasic debate sparked discussions on the ethics of end-of-life choices.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an euthanasic gaze, filled with understanding and acceptance.
meanings.sent5: The euthanasic act was a peaceful release from the unbearable pain.
